content.heroIntro: BENIROL APARTMENTS II represents a premium residential development in the heart of Pueblo, Benijofar, crafted by the renowned GRUPO VISMELL. This exceptional project offers 3 units of modern apartments and penthouses, each thoughtfully designed with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms across 81m² of living space. Starting from €289,900, BENIROL APARTMENTS II combines contemporary architecture with practical design, delivering homes that cater to families, investors, and international buyers seeking authentic Costa Blanca living. The project is strategically positioned to offer easy access to some of the region's most coveted amenities: pristine Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses, and a thriving international community where English is commonly spoken. With completion scheduled for September 1, 2027, this is an opportunity to secure a home in one of Alicante's most sought-after emerging neighborhoods, where property values continue to appreciate at 8% year-on-year.

locationSection.intro: Pueblo is a vibrant residential area in Benijofar that perfectly balances modern convenience with the relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle. This picturesque location has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish living without compromising on amenities. The area benefits from its strategic position between the Costa Blanca's most desirable destinations, offering residents quick access to pristine beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Benijofar itself has evolved into a thriving community with excellent schools, international shops, and restaurants serving global cuisines. The region's established expat community means English is widely spoken, making it exceptionally welcoming for foreign buyers. Properties here command 40% less per square meter than Spanish island markets, making BENIROL APARTMENTS II an exceptional value investment in a rapidly appreciating area.
